EmailTemplate.subject: Profit from Massachusetts' solar growth.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Astrum Solar <http://www.astrumsolar.com>
A Message from Our Partner Program
Boost your company's success.
Solar energy is the future. Are you missing out?
Discover a new opportunity. <http://www.astrumsolar.com/company/partner-programs>
Massachusetts is a solar leader.
Solar momentum is strong, and you can profit from it.
The Astrum Solar Partners Program is a great way to add to your bottom line by participating in one of the hottest growth segments for home owners. Massachusetts has one of the best incentive climates for solar energy. In 2013, the Commonwealth Solar Rebate Program surpassed Governor Patrick’s initial goal of 250 MW of solar power installed—four years early! There is now a new goal of 1,600 MW of solar capacity installed by 2020. With no investment on your part, why not profit from that growth?
All you have to do is something you are already doing, talk to your customers in Massachusetts and refer them to us. For every home owner you refer to us that completes a site survey, you get paid, and your cash bonus is even higher if they become one of our customers.
Earn $100/Qualified Lead*, $750/Sale No Fees to Join Online Landing Page Marketing Templates
Questions? Email us at partners@astrumsolar.com <mailto:partners@astrumsolar.com>.
Profit from solar. Become a partner. <http://www.astrumsolar.com/company/partner-programs>
See a Sunny Day in a Whole New Way Call Us: 800-903-6130 ext. 825
You are receiving this email because you could benefit from the Astrum Solar Partner Program.
* A qualified lead is when the referral prospect agrees to a roof evaluation (i.e. site survey) by Astrum Solar. A solar power system is customized for per home, so pricing, savings, utility bill and solar bill amounts and actual returns vary based on location, system size, available solar incentives and local utility rates. Financing terms vary by location and are not available in all areas. CA 992952, CT 0628993, DC 420212000078, MD 126447, MA 168228, NJ 13VH05618900, NYSERDA Certified Installer, OH 46771, PA 023535, VA 2705143744
